info.description: This is the API documentation for the test-app application.
info.title: test-app API

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token
Register a new user with email and password
post.summary: Register a new user and return a JWT token

get.description: Retrieve a list of events with optional filtering, pagination, and sorting

parameters.description: Filter by user ID (events user is invited to)
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: Filter events starting after this date (RFC3339 format)
parameters.name: start_after

parameters.description: Filter events ending before this date (RFC3339 format)
parameters.name: end_before

parameters.description: Filter by status (draft, active, canceled, etc.)
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Sort order: asc or desc (default: asc)
parameters.name: order

post.description: Create a new event with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve a specific event by its ID

put.description: Update the details of an existing event by its ID. Only the event creator can update the event.

delete.description: Delete a specific event by its ID. Only the event creator can delete the event.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users who have accepted the invitation to the event (status = "Accepted")
get.summary: Get confirmed attendees for an event

post.description: Change the event status to "Cancelled". Only the event creator can cancel the event. This does not delete the event.

400.description: Invalid request or event already cancelled

get.description: Retrieve a list of all invitees for a specific event, including their response status

parameters.description: Filter by invitation status (Pending, Accepted, Declined)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Add one or more users to an event's invitation list. Only the event creator can add invitees.

parameters.description: List of user IDs to invite
parameters.name: invitees

get.description: Retrieve a list of groups that have been invited to a specific event
get.summary: Get invitee groups for an event

post.description: Invite entire groups to an event. All members of the invited groups will be added as invitees. Only the event creator can add groups.
post.summary: Add invitee groups to an event

parameters.description: List of group IDs to invite
parameters.name: groups

put.description: Update the RSVP status of an invitee for a specific event. Event creator or the invitee can update the status.

403.description: Forbidden - not event creator or invitee

delete.description: Remove a user from the event's invitation list. Only the event creator can remove invitees.
delete.summary: Remove an invitee from an event

parameters.description: User ID of the invitee to remove
parameters.name: user_id

get.description: Retrieve the real-time GPS locations of participants who have shared their location for a specific event. Only participants can view locations.
get.summary: Get participant locations for an event

post.description: Update the authenticated user's current GPS location for an event. Only participants can update their location.
post.summary: Update participant location for an event

post.description: Allow the authenticated user to respond to an event invitation. Status must be Accepted or Declined.

400.description: Invalid status (must be Accepted or Declined)

404.description: Event not found or user not invited

post.description: Create a new user with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Update the profile of the currently authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve all events that the currently authenticated user created or is invited to
Retrieve all friends of the currently authenticated user
Retrieve all groups that the currently authenticated user is a member of
Retrieve the most recent location of the authenticated user

post.description: Update the current location of the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by its ID
Retrieve all friends of a specific user

post.description: Send a friend request to another user

get.description: Retrieve all incoming friend requests for a specific user

post.description: Send a friend request to another user

delete.description: Remove a friend from the user's friend list

get.description: Retrieve all groups that a user is a member of
Retrieve the most recent location of a specific user

post.description: Update the current location of a specific user

get.description: Retrieve the location history of a specific user
Retrieve all map pins created by a specific user

post.description: Create a new map pin for the user

group_ids.description: List of group IDs to invite (at least one required)

user_ids.description: List of user IDs to invite (at least one required)

reason.description: Optional reason for cancellation (pointer to distinguish between empty and not provided)

repeat_until.description: Date until which the event should repeat, if applicable // pointer to distinguish between zero time and not set

joined_at.description: Timestamp of when the user joined

share_location.description: true if the user shares location with the group

group_id.description: ID of the group if the invitee is from a group invite

respond_time.description: Timestamp of the response, if responded

group_id.description: UUID of the group, if applicable

notes.description: Optional notes (pointer to distinguish between empty and not provided)

status.description: RSVP status: Accepted or Declined (Pending not allowed for self-RSVP)

notes.description: Optional notes from the invitee (pointer to distinguish between empty and not provided)

status.description: Status must be one of: Pending, Accepted, Declined

friends.description: List of user IDs who are friends with this user

groups.description: List of groups the user belongs to

invites.description: List of event invites for the user

location.description: Current location of the user, if available

updated_at.description: Additional fields can be added as needed

share_location_with_groups.description: List of groups to share location with

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
